channel.title: [508] help character resets[508]
channel.description:
Every time i log out my characters reset, why is that, they just dont save or something.. their items, skills, stats and everything are reset
They maintain the coords that they were in when i logged out but nothing else, even their looks reset!

item.title: [508] help character resets[508]
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

ThatCrackerZach:

Some people just can’t help themselves, he’s doing this to every post, just to get his post count up!

No…
He wanted to be banned…

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help character resets[508]

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I hope you get b&. This type of thing is not tolerated.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help character resets[508]
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:326205”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=422620.msg3102418#msg3102418 date=1263801835]
Obviously it doesn’t save when you logout.
[/quote]

dont Release the server if it doesn’t work right, and its not a very good server
if its a secret on how to fix it. If your going to release it, make it right…

Every time i log out my characters reset, why is that, they just dont save or something…
their items, skills, stats and everything are reset

They maintain the coords that they were in when i logged out but nothing else, even
their looks reset!

It’s a problem Bulby put in his sources on accident. He built them badly and they started to DC and reset characters randomly, not only when they log out.
It is a well kept secret how to stop the resets between myself and one other person, and until someone else can figure it out I’m afraid your out of luck.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help character resets[508]
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:326205”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=422620.msg3102418#msg3102418 date=1263801835]
Obviously it doesn’t save when you logout.
[/quote]
I wish it was that simple.

Every time i log out my characters reset, why is that, they just dont save or something…
their items, skills, stats and everything are reset

They maintain the coords that they were in when i logged out but nothing else, even
their looks reset!

It’s a problem Bulby put in his sources on accident. He built them badly and they started to DC and reset characters randomly, not only when they log out.
It is a well kept secret how to stop the resets between myself and one other person, and until someone else can figure it out I’m afraid your out of luck.[/quote]

I wasn’t totally sure about that one, I’m not too familiar with the 508 protocol. I was just using common sense.

Read full topic

Obviously it doesn’t save when you logout.

[quote=“ThatCrackerZach, post:1, topic:326205”]Every time i log out my characters reset, why is that, they just dont save or something…
their items, skills, stats and everything are reset

They maintain the coords that they were in when i logged out but nothing else, even
their looks reset![/quote]
It’s a problem Bulby put in his sources on accident. He built them badly and they started to DC and reset characters randomly, not only when they log out.
It is a well kept secret how to stop the resets between myself and one other person, and until someone else can figure it out I’m afraid your out of luck.
